thread.section_title: VapeWorld Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of VapeWorld | www.vapeworld.com | 3 of 158
thread.title: Jeannie Riding

author: Jeannie Riding
title: Jeannie Riding
text: I had bought a Firefly 2 that stopped working soon after my purchase. I was sick that I spent so much money on a device I could no longer use. I called Vapeworld and they couldn't have been more professional or sympathetic. They sent me a postage paid return box and I had my new FF2 within 5 days. Buy with confidence from a consumer based company. Just can't say enough about how great these guys are!
